original_text:
And now I will tell you
    what I will do to my vineyard.
I will remove its hedge,
    and it shall be devoured;
I will break down its wall,
    and it shall be trampled down.
korean_text: 이제 내가 내 포도원에 어떻게 행할지를 너희에게 이르리라 내가 그 울타리를 걷어 먹힘을 당하게 하며 그 담을 헐어 짓밟히게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And now I will tell you
what I will do to my vineyard.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 포도원에 무엇을 할 것인지

sentences.original_text: I will break down its wall,
and it shall be trampled down.
